aboutText:
Passionate by informatic and development, i always have at least one side project on my desktop to improve existing skills or to acquire new knowledges about some technologies.
VideoGame Developer since senior year, i'm looking for projects mixing multidisciplinary skills and interacting with experts from various fields like development, network, cybersecurity, UI, UX, graphics, etc.
thoughtList: Looking for cybersecurity training (advanced or beginner) ? PagerDuty is a good start.
In Web too, compiled code is faster than interpreted one. Only two decades passed before WebAssembly came out üéâ
